name: Is the NPPF delivering on its promise of 'sustainable development'?
description: The NPPF one year on - how well is it working, where are the failures and what can be done about these?

speakers.name: Dr Hugh Ellis
speakers.occupation: Chief Planner, Town and Country Planning Association (TCPA)

speakers.name: Brian Waters
speakers.occupation: Chairman, National Planning Forum  and Vice Chair, NPF (Professions)
